name: CINTAS CORPORATION

sampleDescriptions: Advice and counsel regarding federal legislation impacting international trade development and free-trade.
Advice and counsel regarding federal legislation impacting the apparel industry.
Advice and counsel regarding federal regulation impacting the apparel industry.

Advice and counsel on corporate tax reform proposals and the Build Back Better Act which provides for reconciliation pursuant to title II of the Concurrent Resolution on the Budget for Fiscal Year 2022, S. Con. Res. 14.
Advice and counsel on corporate tax reform.
Support for defibrillation access, including H.R. 2370/S. 1024, Access to AEDs Act.
Advice, counsel and advocacy in support of reauthorization of US trade programs relating to Africa and Haiti.
